name: delt.ai
long_description: delt.ai is building a specialized digital financial service for businesses in Latam, set to tackle the +450B Market of business payments in Mexico. delt.ai is a natively digital alternative to a bank, born with payments gateways and API integrations. Its truly digital KYC-compliant onboarding allowed us to be the first opening first branchless accounts in the country. We target poorly served Startups and SMEs therefore focusing on the ~40B market opportunity that are profitable when served fully online.
one_liner: Digital banking for businesses in Latam.
